phrases: A journey from which you can never return.
Treasures that you can never again acquire.
Your very life, which once lost will never be restored.
Nearly all things in this world will never go back to the way they once were.
people still continue, even today, to get up and take another step forward.
Spurred on by the thought of viewing a landscape they have never seen before,
A longing for the unknown, you see, is something not a single soul is capable of stopping.
In any case, that was pretty amazing, Nanachi!
Using the opponent's own special ability against it like that was a brilliant strategy!
I wish you would come with us to the bottom of the netherworld!
I have something to ask of you...
You can ask anything of me!
I knew it would be, but it truly is a hard thing to ask...
Everyone, unable to resist, goes down in
Make those eyes shine brighter than a torch
The destination we are aiming for is deep
The trap of the open-mouthed netherworld
Let us chase the traces of truth
If an answer can be found now, we do not mind losing it all
So that we do not part with that voice
Even if that is a curse
The pulse is the real thing
Never again will the yearning stop
What was that all of a sudden?
He was like, I am going to sleep - just for two hours.
His belly button looks like it hurts, but it does not appear he is been poisoned.
he must be like this'because he fired that thing.
if that is the bottom of this world, I...
Do not stand so close to me!
I hear he is a cave raider from the Abyss.
What is he doing in a place like this?
Now, I believe it is time for a new approach that is free from the influence of conventional wisdom.
From the chief territory of the far north, Sereny...
in search of children suitable for forging a path to the netherworld's next era.
I am a cave raider of the Abyss and a White Whistle.
Brave children, who do not falter even at the prospect of setting foot inside the chasm...
Hey, let us give it a shot...
I do not keep company with idiots.
So we are not the only ones, then, huh?
Now, everyone, come and board the vessel.
Fear not, for my team of cave raiders will escort you throughout the journey.
Your destination is at a depth of around 13,000 meters.
There, in the depths' fifth layer, the Sea of Corpses,
lies the netherworld's forward operating base,
where we strive to unravel the final mysteries of this world.
What do you want to be?
Hey, what is this all about?
Being a White Whistle sure would be great, huh?!
Do not you think we have got ourselves an amazing chance here?
I-I was fine with whatever as long as I could come here.
Before coming here, I would go to garbage dumps and pick out the least disgusting stuff to eat.
Everyone else resorted to stealing or begging while singing songs on the streets...
But I... did not have the talent for anything else...
That is a great skill to have!
There is nothing but treasures to pick up down here!
Hey, hey, if you are fine with whatever, then be my partner!
It says, Capital of the Unreturned.
The only books found in the garbage are the ones other people cannot read, you see...
The way to pronounce nether glyphs has been lost,
so pronunciations from our official language are used in their place.
It is simple once you get the hang of it.
I wonder if that was a bird.
Next time, let us go check it out together!
If you climb more than 10 meters, you will be hit with the strains of ascending.
Now, everyone, let me show you to your room.
Hey, so what is the Abyssal Faith?
When a life is lost in the Abyss, the soul is said to return to the bottom of this planet,
and then the soul changes form and departs on a journey to someone who has wished for life...
This very pit, the bottom of which is still unknown, replaces God.
Well, I suppose it is just kind of a source of comfort and support that cave raiders rely on.
That is my partner for you!
You are the brains of our team!
And you are good at drawing, too!
This time it is Ilim's turn, huh?
I hope I get to go out there soon, too...
There are certainly a lot fewer of us here now...
In any case, it would be great if the two of us are able to go out there together!
After today's medical checkup, let us go on a little walk outside.
What in the world are you thinking?!
Bringing so many people down to the fifth layer like this...
Why bring this up only now?
It is also for this very purpose that I advocated to have Black Whistles enter the fifth layer.
Well, it would be different if they were cave raiders,
but taking children, who will never be able to return given the strain of doing so, is simply...
Ah, then there is no need to worry.
For I am not making use of them as humans, you see...
Come, it is your turn now.
That elevator is capable of quickly going to the depths' sixth layer just below us.
Although its destination is no more than a dead end...
it is just the perfect depth for testing out a number of things, you see...
It is my own miniature garden.
The sixth layer's Curse: Death, or loss of one's humanity...
I would sure like to do something about it.
Those chambers you are in are capable of forcing the Curse all to one side.
Attempts were made that paired a person with something besides a fellow human, but they did not go well...
However, Nanachi just happened to come join us...
I regret having to use two cute, little beings such as yourselves...
But, as you two are such close friends, I am sure this will be a success.
So you are saying... you tricked us?
The result of this research will give birth to the hint needed to drive the darkness from this chasm.
It will be thanks to all of you...
Mitty, you will be on the side to which the Curse is driven.
Please do your best to endure it, okay?
If you die partway through, your partner will also be hit with the Curse.
Well then, let us get started.
So, if I end up not being human anymore...
let my soul return to you, Nanachi!
I found a treasure I hold dear...
Please do not take her away from me.
The two of you are truly wonderful...
Just as usual, I see you are drawing instead of helping with the research...
I now understand the curse that Mitty received.
It is quite a wonderful result.
For it to produce such a byproduct, the Abyss truly is astonishing.
The Curse, which she received twofold, did not just because the loss of her humanity...
but also made her incapable of dying.
Her limbs, which should have been mashed up, have started to grow back.
While this is now the ninth time she is been resurrected...
the only change is that her form becomes slightly more distorted each time.
Mitty, I am sorry for running away like this.
I will not just let him...
Look, Mitty, it is a bird.
It is the same one that was screeching back then, you know.
No matter what I try using, she just suffers.
I am sorry for forcing you to stay alive for nothing...
I will put you out of your misery now.
A way to kill Mitty without making her suffer.
There must be one somewhere out there...
The light that returns to the cardinal point.
There was a certain Relic that he called that.
One of Mitty's eyes was squashed by it, and that is the only part of her that does not regenerate.
Any spot it hits disappears as if it is completely come undone.
Immediately afterward, the surrounding air burns up to nothing...
It is just like the Incinerator!
If you were to use it... then Mitty...
Has Mitty truly lost her humanity?!
She responds to people calling her, and-
No matter what I tried, real communication between us proved impossible.
I am sure you have seen it, too...
Even now, I have a feeling that Mitty's...
that Mitty's soul is imprisoned within that body.
give me some time to think.
I asked you to do something strange like that outta nowhere.
Do not worry, I will still keep treating Riko either way.
Mitty's really taken a liking to her, you know.
I thought of you as being so dependable, but...
just now you appeared so fragile.
The vast amount of medicines here... and the poisons, too...
all of them are for the purpose of trying to restore Mitty's dignity.
If that is your very reason for living...
what... what will become of you?
Hey... just how many days have you been feeling down now?
I will make ya something really hearty.
You want to have some shroom-bear meat?
It is going to be another one of Nanachi's dishes!
Nanachi mixes everything way too much...
I have got to bring out the best of the ingredients.
Hey, you really suck at skinning...
Just go and take a seat!
The meat is really quite dark...
If I remember right, Riko did something like this...
Were the innards supposed to come first?
This here... am I supposed to rinse it first?
Hey, does not this smell, like, super bad to you?
This is worse than the stuff I made!
The smell of excrement is filling my mouth!
Hey, go on and call it irredeemable!
Before anyone knows it, the shooting stone leaves a trail,
which falls as red-hot iron rain...
The ice-covered trees proceed to transform into clouds...
In the gap in the sky, a large turtle with its neck stretched out is...
Ever since then, Nanachi has not approached me about it again.
Is it okay to just leave things as they are?
Nanachi, allow me to ask just one thing...
Is Mitty unhappy being together with you?
Personally, I really do not think-
I know what you are trying to say.
You are thinking that, She seems to be living so peacefully,
so is it really necessary to kill her, right?
I myself will die somehow or other one of these days.
Mitty will be all alone for eternity.
You know, Mitty never eats and she still does not die.
But if she gets stabbed, it still hurts her...
Even if those are mere reflexes, she would still be forced to continue suffering forever.
She is not even capable of screaming out, and yet her soul would remain imprisoned...
Reg, this is the last chance for us.
An opportunity like this will not ever present itself again.
Even if Mitty is not around anymore, do not take your own life.
I have still got to take care of Riko... right?
Even after you are done treating Riko!
In that case... leave it to me.
With every ounce of my thoughts and feelings...
Sorry for making you stick around here with me all this time.
It will not be long before we can meet again.
Reg, I am counting on you.
We will always, always be together, okay?
Come on, this is no time to be feeling down.
Hey, you need to eat too, right?
Once you are done eating, we are heading out.
You are adapting way better than I could have ever imagined!
Nanachi, you are good at this!
Since she is still recovering, I thought I would make her a stew that is nice and easy to eat,
but she kept finding fault with the way I was preparing it.
So that is what that odd smell was...
If you remove the entrails, it is going to taste bland, right?
It will be fine, just fine.
I see demonfish also inhabit the fourth layer.
Nanachi, you are good with your hands, huh?
Do not just stand there, do something!
She is been like this since she first saw me...
Hey, why you acting like you want to rub me, too?
Nanachi, you do not seem to be hating it as much as when I did it.
That is'because you rub me in a lewd kind of way, okay?!
I am glad to hear that.
It is thanks to your help!
Wait, was not there someone else here, too?
Why did I think that, again?
Well, you see, I had this terribly frightening dream.
I cannot remember it all that well, but...
I found myself inside this pitch-black boulder-like thing that was horribly heavy and would not budge.
At first, there was this cavity inside it that was about the same size as me...
but it kept getting smaller and smaller.
It was so painful, so agonizing...
I did not even understand what I was anymore...
I even forgot how to speak...
I was scared - so scared - and I just kept crying...
But this crying was not coming from me.
but then I realized that the other girl was afraid, too.
That helped ease my mind, if just a little.
Then, you see, I stayed like that for quite a while...
Even when I got scared, there was this girl right in front of me who was surely even more frightened.
I could not speak, but with my eyes alone I kept on telling her, It will be alright, it will be alright...
Then I smelled something like smoke, and the crying stopped.
You know, that girl simply left without ever turning to look back...
but I could see her profile.
And she was just like all of the cave raiders I have seen...
That eye I saw was filled with longing.
And then, I remembered what it was I wanted to be one day.
I thought, I need to get going...
At the time, I had a feeling I would see her again.
Riko died once when she was a baby,
and was brought back to life again by the power of a Relic.
Riko's life may very well be deeply tied to the Abyss...
I am going to head out for a bit to fetch some water.
This time, make sure you really protect her.
I come to this same place when I am injured.
Strange beasts that I have never seen anywhere else also come here to take a dip.
You sure this place is alright?
They are docile to the point you can even pat'them.
The deep spots can be overly stimulating, so stay outta'them.
There is light coming up from below.
Reg, sorry, but I cannot get this off by myself.
Riko, lift your arm a bit.
Hey, Reg, you want to go in with me?
I-I am just going to keep a lookout, okay?
Sometimes blood-sucking insects come to have a bite...
and you are pretty good at shooing those away, right?
I will take lookout duty myself.
Ah, the bottom seems pretty slippery...
Wherever we go, the color dissipates around us!
Even though the water's hot, there are small fish in here!
The fish are eating the dead skin that is floating up.
The hot water just stung a bit.
What is up with your penis?
You are really still that fickle about this?
Reg, come on, you have already kissed her, right?
No point in acting embarrassed now.
Reg, what is this kiss thing about?
I am on lookout duty here, so go ahead and take your time in there.
What is this about a kiss?
Jeez, I cannot bear to watch this...
You pulled Reg's treasure up outta that place...
I hope you can wait for me just a bit longer...
A big central one comes next.
Even if it is the thumb alone, at least it moves!
Because I did such a bad job making the cut...
Reg, I am the one who asked you to do it.
In the end, it was Nanachi who saved you.
Told me that while you were working to save me, Reg, you were crying the whole time and were very worried...
I also heard that upon seeing you like that, Nanachi thought, That is me right there,
and rushed to save me without so much as a thought.
Precious proof that you protected me, Reg.
I have something to ask of you.
Would you consider coming along with us?
You are really okay with it?!
Mitty did take a real liking to you.
If I abandoned you midway through your journey, she would be mad at me next time we meet.
And you cannot rely on just Reg alone, after all.
Let us not forget that Riko's cooking is also really good, right?
Well, I will tell you the full story in due time, but...
I came from the place that you are heading for.
You mean... the one you mentioned earlier?
Let us get started with the preparations.
We have got quite a lot to do.
Hey, you want to get going as soon as we can, right?
My mother is waiting for me, after all!
Well then, shall we get going?
I see her signature has disappeared...
You have finally managed to do it.
I would like to express the extent of my gratitude to you.
I would very much like to see you again...
